channel.title: This guy's an asshole
channel.description:
He dosen't speak english well and he added my email asking for srl member scripts, he leeches and has a bad temper. Do what you like to his email, sign him up for gay porn sites for all I care.
paakku10@hotmail.com
"TeEmU... says: why the fuck i stop`` TeEmU... says: fucking noob"
He was doing a very slow offline and online trick.

item.title: This guy's an asshole
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“uber killer, post:6, topic:9281”]Just nudge the fuck out of him, he will block you, so you don’t have to do anything.

Get a program called “nudge maddness” and leave it on all night.[/quote]

Nudge madness is as lame as Germans in patch 1.06 in AOE. All it dose is close the window, open it, nudge, and repeat. MSN 7.0 status to busy and scar is alot more faster.

item.title: This guy's an asshole
item.dc:creator: @JukuG JukuG
item.description:
@JukuG wrote:

[quote=“Squigglyo, post:5, topic:9281”]lol theres assholes everywhere.

Back when i was sellin scripts some guy threatened to give away my pay to use scripts if i didnt refund him simply because he got bored with runescape. I blocked him, signed him up to spam, and have never heard from him since:P

Same thing with someone claiming to be a Jagex employee and saying i needed to pay them or theyd report me to the police, told him he was a fucking retard cause his England Police cant get me over in Australia land anyway, blocked him, and spammed the fuck outa his email[/quote]

lol, England police makes me lol.

Read full topic
